61 BROADWAY, NEW YORK
March 12, 1923
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
I have recently run across the memorandum of
Mr. Rose's interview with General Gorgas on July 14,
1914, in which the question of yellow fever control was
first discussed. This memorandum marks the beginning
of the International Health Board's program in this
field. It occurs to me that you would be glad to have
a copy of the interview for use in connection with the
history of yellow fever. A copy is enclosed.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Florence M. Read Answered - March 18/23
Doctor H. R. Carter
Assistant Surgeon General
2121 California Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C.
I was quite thrilled
by the discovery !
FMR:EP E
